htmlContent: If the US controls Canada, the US may place 1 Influence in any country already containing US Influence at the conclusion of any Action Round in which the DEFCON marker moves to the ‘2’ box. This event canceled by #42 Quagmire.
name: NORAD*
plainContent: If the US controls Canada, the US may place 1 Influence in any country already containing US Influence at the conclusion of any Action Round in which the DEFCON marker moves to the ‘2’ box. This event canceled by #42 Quagmire.
